Story (cont.): One day Nagi brings in a half-Asian (might be from South America) friend Dorogo who will also be living w/ them now that he has a job. Dorogo later has anal sex w/ him, Nagi is actually fine w/ it. His daily life is now both Nagi (sex) & Dorogo (anal sex). They bring another friend Mio who ran away from home to live w/ them. Nagi told her she can live w/ them if she has sex w/ MC. MC has more trouble at work, takes paid leave. Nagi cheers him up, later he has sex w/ all 3 girls, Mio declares he wants to marry him. MC says she's crazy but Dorogo says that everyone is crazy. MC decides that the place is a place where they can all be crazy & they fuck happily ever after

Story: MC is a man in his 40's who originally got married thru an app to a single mom but then she spent all of his savings & left him broke, w/ no money & jobless, & left him. One day his ex-wife's daughter Nagi comes over to his place & asks to live there for a while, he agrees. Nagi is also a huge spender = more bills to pay, MC becomes even more sad. Nagi offers to console him w/ sex. MC goes wild & they do it every day. MC finds re-employment later on but boss is an asshole, he's fine tho bc he now has Nagi to comfort him.
